You reach out and place your hands on the black orb, concentrating deeply as you do so. You feel your mind escaping from your body, flowing into the black orb. Like stepping out of a portal, you arrive inside a vast domed cave. You see a beautiful kargish woman holding her hands up to cover her ears due to a loud drumming that echoes through the cave. Your vision becomes blurry, and you return to your body with a jerk, instinctively removing your hands from the orb.
